faq.question: What is the Software Testing course?
faq.answer: This course trains you in both manual and automation testing, covering Selenium, API testing, Agile practices, and QA processes. You'll gain practical experience to work as a professional tester.

faq.question: Who can join this course?
faq.answer: Engineering graduates, freshers, diploma holders, and working professionals interested in QA can join. No prior experience is required.

faq.question: What job roles are available after this course?
faq.answer: You can apply for QA Engineer, Automation Tester, API Tester, Manual Tester, or Test Analyst roles across IT companies.

faq.question: What tools and technologies will I learn?
faq.answer: Selenium WebDriver, Cypress, Postman, JIRA, Agile Testing, TestNG, Automation Scripts, API Testing, and Manual Testing techniques.

faq.question: How long is the course?

faq.question: Does the course provide placement support?
faq.answer: Yes! UNIQ Technologies offers 100% placement support with continuous interview calls and guidance.

faq.question: Can I rejoin the course if I miss any topic?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You can rejoin any future batch at no extra cost with lifetime learning access.

faq.question: Is online training available?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer both online and offline live instructor-led sessions.

faq.question: Can I switch between online and offline classes?
faq.answer: Yes, you can switch anytime without extra fees.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate?
faq.answer: Yes, you will receive a Course Completion Certificate recognized by top IT recruiters.
